job.title: Software Engineer / Web Developer (Python) REMOTE
job.description: <p>Full Stack Engineer / Web Developer</p><p><br></p><p>We are looking for a great coder who has experience with Python, Django, Postgres, Git, HTML5, AWS, responsive object-oriented web design, and good communication skills.&nbsp;iOS/ChromeOS development is a plus.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>The hiring company, SPROCKIT, is well established and profitable. Small team building a brand new product.&nbsp;All REMOTE positions.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>This is a permanent position for an Internet Software Engineer / Web Developer / Full Stack Engineer / Software Developer.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>You will design and build scalable internet web-based software systems in a high-availability, high-performance Python / Django environment on AWS.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Lead the technical level design, development, testing and debugging of software components and products.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Take ownership of product problems and issues including pro-actively communicating to coordinate activities.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Develop features in an Agile environment and quickly apply new software enhancements and improvement upgrades effectively.</p><p><br></p><p>Desired Skills and Experience</p><p>Education: B.S. in Computer Science, Engineering.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Experience:</p><p>... Minimum 3+ years "hands-on" Internet/web software development experience.</p><p>... Experience in development on Unix, Linux, or Solaris platforms.</p><p>... Strong object-oriented design &amp; development skills.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Skills and Abilities:&nbsp;</p><p>... Expert-level Python development skills, Django familiarity.</p><p>... Experience with exception handling, namespaces, and internationalization.</p><p>... Familiarity with database applications and SQL is highly desirable.</p><p>... Strong analytical, communication, and problem solving skills.</p><p>... Team-oriented individual, energetic, results oriented, and interested in quality.</p><p>... Strong knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and fundamental concepts.</p><p>... Fluent in object-oriented programming languages, such as Python.</p><p>... Familiarity with AWS is desirable, but not required.</p>
